bioconda.name: mindthegap
bioconda.summary: MindTheGap performs detection and assembly of DNA insertion variants in NGS read datasets with respect to a reference genome. MindTheGap can also be used as a genome assembly finishing tool, it can fill the gaps between a set of input contigs without any a priori on their relative order and orientation.

biocontainers.name: mindthegap
biocontainers.summary: Mindthegap performs detection and assembly of dna insertion variants in ngs read datasets with respect to a reference genome.

biotools.summary: Performs detection and assembly of DNA insertion variants in NGS read datasets with respect to a reference genome.

bioschemas.name: MindTheGap
bioschemas.summary: Performs detection and assembly of DNA insertion variants in NGS read datasets with respect to a reference genome.
